=== About Htut Myat ===

      Hello ,I am Htut Myat.I am from Myanmar , Mandalay State # Mandalay City.I am a core Member of Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team and organize the Ubuntu Related Activity at Mandalay .I love Ubuntu  and love to contribute Ubuntu to others.

      I am currently a student from Technological University (Mandalay) ,majored in Electronics.I have a strong interest in Electronics,IT and Computer related technology especially programming and web development and system management.
      
      I started to use Ubuntu since 2010 when <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/kokoye2007|Ko Ko Ye]]</nowiki> and Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team introuduced at BarCamp Mandalay .The local community and online community make me easy to learn about Ubuntu ,about Linux.That's why i love Ubuntu ,the strong community.Now i organized camps and discussions about Ubuntu in some University and some training center in Mandalay ,introduced what is Linux ,what is Ubuntu and some tips and tricks like installation ,desktop effect and some development procedure.

=== Goals ===
==== Life Goals ====
I want to learn more in programming, and learn bug fixing and applying patches, also I hope to be an Ubuntu developer.

I'm using Linux since I was 2010~2011, as well as I have a big knowledge in Linux.

I am an active member and Leader of my native loco team (ubuntu-mm).

==== Future Goal ====
learn Python well. 

Become an Ubuntu member. 

Develop some Python applications. 

Help my team become an re-approved LoCo team.
Because I am proud of Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team and Burmese Translation Team

Share to our community Fix bugs and apply patches. 

Become an Ubuntu developer.

Become Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team with Ubuntu Member / Ubuntu Developer.
